title: List of Featherstone Rovers players
text:
<a href="Featherstone%20Rovers">Featherstone Rovers</a> are an <a href="England">English</a> <a href="rugby%20league">rugby league</a> club. Everyone who played for the club between 1921 and 2016 has been allocated a sequential heritage number by the club, in order of their appearance. The list comprise 1,051 players.
List of players.
 
References.
